snippet: President Hassan Rouhani has stoked hopes for liberalization and economic relief, but people in Tehran have seen little of that yet.
abstract: Tehran Journal; Pres Hassan Rouhani excited Iranians' expectations with promises of liberalization, economic relief and removal of Western sanctions, yet four months after his election broad change has yet to materialize; some residents of Tehran express frustration, though they remain relieved to have seen last of former Pres Mahmoud Ahmadinejad.
lead_paragraph: President Hassan Rouhani has stoked hopes for liberalization and economic relief, but people in Tehran have seen little of that yet.

headline.main: Hopeful City, Buoyed by Campaign Vows, Waits for Change in Iran
headline.print_headline: Hopeful City, Buoyed By Campaign Vows, Waits for Change
